Params: {2: 'System Voice', 3: 'Energy check, complete. System check, complete.'}
{2: 'System Voice', 3: 'Halcyon 2 leaving the rail. Starting to climb.'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: "Don't forget our mission! Leave the ground to the army!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Any luck on your end, old man?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'AWACS', 3: '(Lots of white noise) Warning, warning. Lock-on, lock-on!'}
{3: 'Gunshots and screaming could be heard from the communicator, including a vague broadcasting voice.'}
{2: 'AWACS', 3: 'Urgent communication. The log data shows the missile that destroyed the acceleration rail 5 minutes ago was launched from Dagger 2!'}
{2: 'AWACS', 3: 'Immediately changing the IFF (identification, friend or foe) info of Dagger 2 to hostile! Repeat, Dagger 2 is hostile!'}
{2: 'AWACS', 3: 'Warning! Warning! Shuttle has been locked on! Repeat! Shuttle has been locked on!'}
{3: 'The communication is cut. Everything becomes silent again.'}
